| HistoryText             = The Outcasts are a group of animal-, insect-, and vegetable-based life forms mutated into often vaguely humanoid forms by the [[Gamma Bomb]] explosion which created the Hulk. They lived in underground tunnels connected to [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Bruce Banner]]'s [[Hulk's Cave|hidden desert lab]]. They befriended [[Richard Jones (Earth-616)|Rick Jones]] when he was briefly transformed into a Hulk himself, but asked him to leave their company after the Army wounded or killed several of them while hunting him.
